name: Trancelation
description: A dynamic arcade game set in a neon universe full of fractals and translations! Boost your memory, develop new skills, and improve your scores to become a master of Trancelation in this ever-changing journey through linguistics!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7/8/10, 64-bit Процессор: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4/ AMD Athlon or equivalent Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Intel HD Graphics 5500 DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 300 MB Звуковая карта: All integrated sound cards
